title: Sweet roasted chicken bap
ingredients: ['6 tbsp wholegrain mustard', '4 tsp clear honey', '4 skinless boneless chicken thighs, about 85 g (3 oz) each', '4 large baps, plain or wholemeal', '8 small Cos lettuce leaves', '2 small ripe mangoes, sliced', '2 spring onions, thinly sliced (optional)', 'salt and pepper']
